desc: The Chinese Tea Company is based on Portobello Road in Notting Hill, London. Shop online today. We specialize premium Chinese tea that is sourcing directly from tea gardens China. We sell all tea types that is single origin Green tea, Oolong tea, Puerh tea, White tea, Black tea, Jasmine tea, Flowering Tea, Dark tea.

layout.text: PURVEYORS OF PREMIUM LOOSE-LEAF TEA AND TEAWARE
